summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2166, for the improvement of East Alder Street, from 32nd Avenue to 33rd Avenue, and 33rd Avenue from East Alder Street to the south line of Leschi Heights Addition, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks, under Ordinance No. 21725 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
